titles.title: Military Family PROTECT Act

A bill to provide for multidisciplinary teams for military installations on child abuse and other domestic violence, to require a pilot program on nurse home visits to reduce child abuse and improve safe childcare among military families, and for other purposes.
Military Family Prevention, Response, and Other Training to End Military Family Abuse and Connect Communities Today Act
Military Family PROTECT Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Military Family Prevention, Response, and Other Training to End Military Family Abuse and Connect Communities Today Act or Military Family PROTECT Act
This bill requires the establishment on military installations multidisciplinary teams on child abuse and other domestic violence.
The Defense Health Agency of the Department of Defense must carry out a pilot program on universal nurse home visits for providing families training on safe childcare practices aimed at reducing child abuse and fatalities.
